ygData.subject: Re: Powerleveling bards (was Cazic Thule Slain....]
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I most definitely do not envy their job.  So many spells, so little mana.  And everyone has got to have X buff, beg beg beg. It would drive me nuts. ...
ygData.messageBody:
> Might add shaman to this list, they have a lot of different
> spells, and deciding when to cast which isn't the easiest.

I most definitely do not envy their job. So many spells, so
little mana. And everyone has got to have X buff, beg beg beg.
It would drive me nuts.

> I still chuckle to myself as I watch shamans spend half the fight
> trying to slow the target, at which time the wizard stands up and
> finishes it off in 10 seconds.

Togors is incredible if it sticks. I mean, wow... thing is
barely moving. hehe.

Harmonic.
